text: Michael Edward John Gore, CVO, CBE (20 September 1935 â€“ 8 July 2022) was a British politician. He was Governor of the Cayman Islands from 1992 to 1995. He was born in Kingston on Thames, Surrey, England. He was also an Ambassador to the Bahamas and Liberia. Gore died on 8 July 2022 in Zurich, Switzerland at the age of 86.Former Governor Gore passes away ==References== ==Other websites== * List of Governors and Predecessors of the Cayman Islands * Cayman Islands Government Web Site Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom Category:Governors of the Cayman Islands
title: Michael Edward John Gore
